snippet: The success of Matt Harvey in his first two major leagues starts has some wondering whether Zack Wheeler, the Mets' other coveted pitching prospect, might also make an appearance in the big leagues this year.
abstract: The success of Matt Harvey in his first two major leagues starts has some wondering whether Zack Wheeler, the Mets' other coveted pitching prospect, might also make an appearance in the big leagues this year.

headline.main: Will Wheeler Follow Harvey to the Majors? Collins Says Not So Fast
